posts.post_content:
In a world where Pitchforks, Torches, and steaknives are considered top-notch anti-Evil security.....
  
   
   
HEEZA FIRIN IZ LAAAAZAAAHHHHH!!!!!!!!
  
   
   
Seriously people- that is a laser gun on a Magic card. Do NOT underestimate this. o.O
  
   
If you get two of these on the stack at the same time, with the intention of targetting the same card, they don't actually enter the battlefield. Instead, the beams get crossed and the Stay Pufft Marshmallow Man (13/13 Flying Hexproof Indestructible Trample Legendary Creature- Marshmallow Zombie Spirit Demon)
  
comes in and kills the crap out of everyone.

posts.post_content:
I don't think I'm the only one under the impression that if he didn't have flash, he'd be much less valuable. Sure, I can play it on my turn and [Day of Judgment](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Day of Judgment) again. But why not play it on yours, and [Negate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Negate) you out of the graveyard?   
  
And that's just the tip of the iceberg with this guy. Mark my words, Blue/White control, maybe even Esper control, will make you absolutely loathe this card.  
  
Why?  
  
[Venser, the Sojourner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Venser, the Sojourner)
posts.html:
I don't think I'm the only one under the impression that if he didn't have flash, he'd be much less valuable. Sure, I can play it on my turn and Day of Judgment again. But why not play it on yours, and Negate you out of the graveyard?

And that's just the tip of the iceberg with this guy. Mark my words, Blue/White control, maybe even Esper control, will make you absolutely loathe this card.

Why?

Venser, the Sojourner

Posted By: IUHoosier (10/3/2011 12:32:30 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Run this with basically anything, and you have an edge over your opponent. Here are a few ideas-  
  
[Timely Reinforcements](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Timely Reinforcements)  
[Join the Ranks](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Join the Ranks)  
[Doom Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doom Blade)  
[Mana Leak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mana Leak)  
[Think Twice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Think Twice)  
[Bump in the Night](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bump in the Night)  
[Sorin's Thirst](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sorin's Thirst)  
[Memoricide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Memoricide)  
  
This thing is going to an auto-include in any staple w/u control deck, and with damn good reason.  
  
Edit:  
  
Just so people know, [Curse of Death's Hold](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Curse of Death's Hold ) shuts this card down. It can't flashback if it can't enter the battlefield, so keep that curse safe and it will keep you safe.
posts.html:
Run this with basically anything, and you have an edge over your opponent. Here are a few ideas-

Timely Reinforcements
Join the Ranks
Doom Blade
Mana Leak
Think Twice
Bump in the Night
Sorin's Thirst
Memoricide

This thing is going to an auto-include in any staple w/u control deck, and with damn good reason.

Edit:

Just so people know, Curse of Death's Hold shuts this card down. It can't flashback if it can't enter the battlefield, so keep that curse safe and it will keep you safe.
